mapper.insert: insert into station_timetable(line, subline, station_id, direction, arrivetime, lefttime, orig_station_id, dest_station_id, train_id, express_yn, daytype) values (#{line}, #{subline}, #{stationId}, #{direction}, #{arriveTime}, #{leftTime}, #{origStationId}, #{destStationId}, #{trainId}, #{expressYn}, #{dayType})
